website_summaries.verdict: Offers a formula specifically for large breed puppies, focused on helping develop a strong immune system.
pros: Makes use of two proteins to improve overall growth
Customers like how food also promotes healthy joints, which helps large breeds as they grow into adulthood
cons: Some puppy owners say their dogs didn't like the taste
No specific formula available for small breed puppies

customer_reviews.title: Made my Dobyshepherd face/third eyelids swell
customer_reviews.text: This dog food made my Dobyshepherd mix dog sick. His third eyelids would swell up so bad that he couldn't see. We took him to the vet and put him on allergy meds for seasonal allergies, but later realized that it was the dog food. We thought that he had seasonal allergies because he would go outside to potty right after he ate and would come back inside swollen. One day I saw him normal, and as soon as he finished eating, he was blind again because his eyelids swelled so much he couldn't see. I took his bowls away and washed them along with changing his dog food and he was fine again.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great food, better price elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: My puppy transitioned well from Taste of the Wild food after the FDA advised against grain free diets. This food got great reviews on dogfoodadvisor.com and the price seemed okay, until I went to Menards and found it in store for $10 less a bag so I will be buying it there from now on. We plan to switch to the power adult line when we are finished with the puppy line.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: I have a Great Dane/Doberman mix puppy and I was giving her the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Great Dane/Doberman mix puppy and I was giving her the highest end purina large breed food which she grazed on but never would eat enough. after switching her over to this i saw an improvement the first day. Immediately she consumed her first 2 cups of the day in under 10 minutes. I was able to achieve getting her to eat her 4 cups a day where as before I could barely get her to eat 2
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: On our second bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pit/Dane mix rescue boy!! And I'm on my second bag of Eagle Pack Large & Giant Breed. He seems to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog a Great Pyrenees/Anatolian Shepherd mix kept throwing up because the kibble is to large for her she’s 8 months old. She would also have some diarrhea. After reading the low reviews I wonder if all the bags are expired that they ships three the bag out once I put it in my food bin or I’d check. I bought blue puppy because she was still having bad reactions and she’s much better. DO NOT BUY THIS FOOD!
customer_reviews.author: aspen2004

customer_reviews.title: Bad Gas
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked Eagle Pack better than Merrick grain free food but the Eagle Pack gave her terrible gas!!! When I say terrible....I mean clear a room terrible. If she had an accident (still a puppy) I could immediately smell it all the way upstairs the second she did it! While it may not have that affect on all dogs...it did mine and I had to switch her food again. I switched to Nutro puppy and the gas issue is gone and when she goes to the potty now she doesn't stink at all. Eagle Pack just wasn't right for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Really like the larger kibble
customer_reviews.text: Really like the larger kibble, as the previous food (Earthborn Holistic) was very small for my German Shepherd puppy. I wasn't sure if she really liked the taste but seems to eat it well. Her coat is the shiniest coat ever and I like the quality ingredient specifically for large breed pups. I still mix some of the Earthborn with the Eagle as it is still my first choice food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: When we adopted our great dane our vet warned us not to feed her typical puppy food, even for large breed's, because of the high protein level which could make her growth too rapid. She said this brand is the only exception because it is geared toward giant breed puppies. She's been on this food since we brought her home almost four months ago and her growth is right in track and her coat is so shiny, soft on healthy. She also has had no tummy issues, which is something I I usually always deal with with puppies. She will definitely be continuing to use this food and will transition to the giant breed adult when she's 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Very small Kibbles I could nut use because my puppy ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small Kibbles I could nut use because my puppy is a large breed and it falls out of her mouth and cant be chewed. Gave to my grand daughtr for her small dog so I was not able to really rate the product From other reviews I thought the kibbles were larger.
customer_reviews.author: David W Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Feed with caution...
customer_reviews.text: One of my three Rottweilers got very ill from this food for several days making me think there is an ingredient that she was either allergic to, or could not digest properly. I realize that the issue may have been with my Rottie and not necessarily the food since her brother and sister were fine, but for a puppy formula so highly rated by dog food nutrition "experts", I just think it should have better quality control for sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product for my Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: terrible product. Gave my Great Dane diarrhea with urgency. Switched to royal canon junior giant. So so much better!! He loves it and formed up his stools immediately. So relieved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best quality per the dollar
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loves Eagle Pack! We have subscribed via amazon and plan to keep feeding eagle pack as long as they maintain their high quality! When researching dog food I sorted brands by quality first and then by price hoping to find the best quality per the dollar option. We found Eagle Pack and have not looked back since.
customer_reviews.author: Robnkatie

customer_reviews.title: I have to say my puppy was not very happy with it and be stopped eating it
customer_reviews.text: I only got this food because this is the food the breeder started our puppy on. I have to say my puppy was not very happy with it and be stopped eating it, once we started integrating the new food he would pick out the new food and leave this food, DISCLAIMER: I am an Amazon reviewer and I paid full price for this item - this is my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Lorianne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I chose to try this food because the ingredients looked good and the reviews were good as well. However, this food did not do well for my dogs at all. They’ve both been experiencing terrible gas and constant diarrhea..one of them has also developed some mild hair loss and a dull coat. I had high hopes for this food but it’s obviously not a good fit for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey

customer_reviews.title: Eagle Pack Natural Dry Dog Food Large Breed Puppy
customer_reviews.text: Smells like rancid grease. My dog would't eat it. Best buy date is 2 months away, I think it's old.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I have seen the birds eat it when I put ...
customer_reviews.text: I have seen the birds eat it when I put it in the dog bowl. Not sure how my dog likes it. He is not overweight though.
customer_reviews.author: nickolas sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for labs!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 11-wk old lab puppy who was having stomach problems and looked malnourished. The breeder recommended Pro Plan Large breed puppy, but her stools were always runny and her size was about half that of her siblings. We began switching to Eagle Pack four days ago and saw a huge transformation. Now, her stools are completely solid and she has finally begun to fill out. She also loves the food. Would highly recommend to other lab owners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, 4 month doberman loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Feed my 3 month doberman pup this food, after feeding her Canidae puppy food from 8 weeks-3 mos. She was too bony on grain free. After eating this for a month, she put on 13 lbs, now weighs 30lb. Coat is shiny. She eats all of her food, her poop is regular, little softer than when on Canidae but solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kekai

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: The reason I'm giving it a low score is because their price was great, then they got greedy and went up. So, I will not be buying again.

Cali's poops smell so much better than before when she was eating a different brand of puppy chow.

I feel safe giving them eagle pack because of their no grain no fillers guarantee.

customer_reviews.title: Now that my pup is all healthy he is scarfing this stuff like no one's business and gaining weight to a more ...
customer_reviews.text: Changing my review from 4 to 5 stars as I think the only issue with his appetite had to do with worms and not the food. Now that my pup is all healthy he is scarfing this stuff like no one's business and gaining weight to a more healthy one for his size. My puppy absolutely loves this food and I love how healthy it is for him.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for high quality puppy food
customer_reviews.text: We chose this brand because the rescue organization that matched us with our dog uses this product in their kennel. Our Doberman Pinscher puppy devours this dry dog food. Eagle Pack Large and Giant Breed Puppy natural lamb dog food is a nutritious formula for large breed dogs. We keep handfuls in our pocket to reinforce good behavior and he eagerly accepts the treat. No need for expensive pill treats...the kibble is a perfect size.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Great quality dog food NOT loaded with fillers and by-products that are bad for dogs digestive systems. Plenty of protein and proteinated vitamin/minerals. Our puppy loves it.

customer_reviews.title: This food has been perfect for our giant breed puppy (Great Pyrenees)
customer_reviews.text: This food has been perfect for our giant breed puppy (Great Pyrenees). It is easily digestible, he seems to enjoy the taste and his growth while eating it has been right on track.

customer_reviews.title: Great for giant breeds
customer_reviews.text: This is great puppy food. Perfect for giant breed dogs. My Great Dane has grown beautifully on this food. I also love that it has multiple protein sources and that is so important for growth in giant breeds.

Plus he had a hard time chewing this food as the kibble is three times larger than purina. Wish I switched a long time ago

I'm considering changing dogfood. Update August 5, 2017- changing dog food, after pouring the dog food into my dogs feeder, After a few days I opened the feeder and there were bugs in the feeder!! Gross! Also my dog has never gained much weight, in my opinion he is under weight. I'm done!

customer_reviews.title: Diarreah and weight loss
customer_reviews.text: My puppy lost so much weight and had diarreah like crazy. She only ate it when she was starving. I lasted all of two weeks before I had to take her to vet to make sure it wasn't an illness. Since then I switch to another brand and her poop is great. As is her weight gain. $30 some odd dollars and a $125 vet bill later....
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Buy Something Else
customer_reviews.text: We have given this to our labradoodle puppy for 3 months now. She has never liked it, it's hard to chew. When we switched her to a new food, she ate all her new food and spit this food out. For the same price or less, go ahead and invest in PurinaOne Puppy Chow or Science Diet Puppy. Your dog will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Bishard

customer_reviews.title: My dogs won't eat this!
customer_reviews.text: I have two german shepherds (5 months and 4 years), and neither will eat this food. They are not picky at all, and I have never had an issue with the dogs just not eating. Both dogs would rather eat low-fat adult dog food rather than this puppy food. I even mixed it with canned dog food, just to get them to eat some, and they wouldn't eat it. It smells fine and doesn't appear to have an issues (visually), but they just don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: LAF

customer_reviews.title: Not liked by my boxers.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several brands of large breed puppy dry food, and this one was the least favorable to my boxers. The product itself could be of a high quality, but this was not in my boxers' opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Eagle Pack Natural Dry Dog Food Large Breed Puppy Food Lamb, Chicken & Fish
product_meta.description: Size:30 lbEagle Pack Natural Dry Dog Food Large & Giant Breed Puppy Formula provides the right balance of proteins, fats and carbohydrates, combined with health-promoting antioxidant support, omega fatty acids and DHA to support healthy growth in puppies who will weigh over 50 pounds at maturity.
feature_bullets: LEAN BODY MASS FOR OPTIMAL PERFORMANCE: This food features optimal protein, fat and carbohydrate levels for large breed dogs of all life stages; expertly balanced to help large breed dogs stay lean and fit throughout their life

WHOLE BODY HEALTH: DHA supports brain development, glucosamine supports joints, omega fatty acids support skin and coat and antioxidants promote a strong immune system; made with no corn, wheat, meat byproducts, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives
TRIED, TRUSTED AND TRUE: Natural Performance Proven Nutrition, loved by dogs for over 30 years

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients, we prepare each of our diets in our own state of the art facility; we craft delicious natural recipes with wholesome ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits
PERFORMANCE NUTRITION: At Eagle Pack, we’re proud to support the champion spirit in every dog; our Performance Proven Nutrition is specially formulated to support your dog’s everyday health needs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
